definitions.text: anything that contributes causally to a result
examples: a number of factors determined the outcome
jealousy was a component of his character
two constituents of a musical composition are melody and harmony
the grammatical elements of a sentence
a key factor in her success
humor: an effective ingredient of a speech

definitions.text: one of two or more integers that can be exactly divided into another integer
a businessman who buys or sells for another in exchange for a commission
any of the numbers (or symbols) that form a product when multiplied together

(genetics) a segment of DNA that is involved in producing a polypeptide chain; it can include regions preceding and following the coding DNA as well as introns between the exons; it is considered a unit of heredity

examples: a quantum computer can factor the number 15
make things factor into a company's profitability

definitions.text: consider as relevant when making a decision
examples: You must factor in the recent developments
